my-ocular/status-hover: This is a customized status from ocular, displayed by Scratch Addons. You can set your own at https://ocular.jeffalo.net/dashboard.
my-ocular/@name: Show ocular.jeffalo.net statuses and post reactions
my-ocular/@description: Shows ocular statuses and reactions. Uses jeffalo.net to obtain data.
my-ocular/@settings-name-reactions: Show reaction buttons and "View on ocular" link
